overview: Andre (Hudi Prayogo), who is rescued from the ocean by the family of Henry (Turino Djunaidy), falls in love with Henry’s daughter Cynthia (Kiki Fatmala). However, Cynthia’s brother, Daniel (Deddy Rizaldy), dislikes Andre, who suffers from amnesia, intensely. Ten years pass, and Andre still hasn’t gotten his memory back. After Henry dies, Daniel wastes a lot of money on partying and gambling, while Andre and Cynthia become increasingly serious about each other.
title: Kabut Asmara
